page.title: 10CROSSLEY FARM - MIRFIELD
page.content: We surveyed Crossley Farm, owned by Messrs. Hurst & Barber, who specialise in{dairy farming.}This is carried out in buildings, some of which are 100 years old. The area of buildings currently in use is 22,000 sq.feet. Farmer Barber has 180 cows, 20 calves and 1 bull. The area of farmland being used for{grass growing}is 200 acres and there are also 3 acres of{ {woodland. }The type of milk produced is Green Top, Pasteurised and Semi-Skimmed. The quantity of milk produced per annum is in{excess of {1,000,000 litres.}The number of people {employed}on the farm is 4 full-time men, 3 part-time men and 1 part-time woman. The main change that has been made is that more machinery is now being used, also more semi-skimmed milk is being produced. Retail trade has also expanded.
